etymology.description: 呷 + 哺 = Xiabu Xiabu hot pot chain
etymology.interpretation: This name is a playful imitation of the sound of eating (呷) and feeding (哺) and is used as a brand name for a popular hot pot restaurant chain in China.

examples.chinese: 呷哺呷哺是一个非常受欢迎的连锁火锅店。
examples.pinyin: Xiā bǔ xiā bǔ shì yīgè fēicháng shòu huānyíng de liánsuǒ huǒguō diàn.
examples.english: Xiabu Xiabu is a very popular chain hotpot restaurant.

examples.chinese: 我们常常去呷哺呷哺聚餐(我們常常去呷哺呷哺聚餐)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen chángcháng qù xiā bǔ xiā bǔ jùcān.
examples.english: We often go to Xiabu Xiabu for gatherings.

examples.chinese: 呷哺呷哺的火锅味道鲜美可口(呷哺呷哺的火鍋味道鮮美可口)。
examples.pinyin: Xiā bǔ xiā bǔ de huǒguō wèidào xiānměi kěkǒu.
examples.english: The hot pot at Xiabu Xiabu is delicious and flavorful.
